rukus.text: aye wo logo jo imaan laaye ho! jume ke din namaaz ki azaan di jaaye to tum Allah ke zikr ki taraf daud pado aur qareed wa farooqth chohd do, ye tumhaare haq mein bahuth hee behtar hai agar tum jaante ho
phir jab namaaz ho chuke to zameen mein phail jaao aur Allah ka fazl talaash karo aur ba kasrath Allah ka zikr kiya karo ta ke tum falaah pa lo

aur jab koyi sauda bikta dekhe ya koyi tamaasha nazar aa jaaye to us ki taraf daud jaate hai aur aap ko khada hee chohd dete hai, aap keh dijiye ke Allah ke paas jo hai wo khel aur tijaarath se behtar hai aur Allah taâ€™ala behetreen rozi rasa hai
